import React from 'react'; import {Tooltip,OverlayTrigger,Form,ButtonGroup,ButtonToolbar,CardColumns,CardGroup,Card,Button,Container,Nav,Navbar,NavDropdown,Row,Col,Tab } from 'react-bootstrap'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import './Rules.css'; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route, Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Rules = (props) => { const commaNumber = require('comma-number') const allGame1_deadline_time = props.allGame1_deadline_time; const treasure = commaNumber(props.totalTreasure,','); // console.log(game1_id)s const renderTooltip = (props) => ( Once you have purchased your Blox they buy you 30 seconds to enter your answer, no one else can answer in this time and this stops bots from beating you to it! ); return(
Step 1 - Enter Game Step 2 - Unlock Clues Step 3 - Time Lock Final Step Play To Earn Points? Please Note
To enter the game, pay a one time fee in blox. Play game to unlock clues, once you've solved the clue go to Step 3 Think you know the answer? Use your blox to Purchase a 90 second time lock. Once you have purchased the time lock you are the only player who can enter the secret. Answer the riddle correctly and win! 30% of the prize goes to the winner and 70% shared with all players as a % of their points. The more you play the larger the proprtion you'll recieve. You gain points every time you play and for leveling up. Each step requires a seperate transaction.
); }; export default Rules;
